Sentencas: The influence of the preparation condition of Ni - scandia-stabilized zirconia (Ni-ScSZ) cermet on the tolerance to carbon deposition was investigated in the wide temperature range of 800 - 1000 degrees C.
Titulo: Carbon deposition over Ni-ScSZ anodes subjected to various heat-treatments for internal reforming of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The mixture of NiO-ScSZ was subjected to preheat-treatments prior to use as a cermet electrode.
Titulo: Carbon deposition over Ni-ScSZ anodes subjected to various heat-treatments for internal reforming of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Although the inhibitory effect of ScSZ in Ni-based cermet for carbon deposition is well known, the present study revealed that the preparation method and firing condition influenced the carbon deposition behavior.
Titulo: Carbon deposition over Ni-ScSZ anodes subjected to various heat-treatments for internal reforming of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The Ni - ScSZ cermet obtained from the oxide mixture heated at 1400 degrees C showed peculiar behavior to carbon deposition.
Titulo: Carbon deposition over Ni-ScSZ anodes subjected to various heat-treatments for internal reforming of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The initial carbon deposition rate at 800 - 900 degrees C for this sample was larger than that at 1000 degrees C, whereas other samples exhibited a reduction in deposition rate with decreasing temperature.
Titulo: Carbon deposition over Ni-ScSZ anodes subjected to various heat-treatments for internal reforming of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The cubic phase stabilization in ScSZ was confirmed for the sample treated at 1400 degrees C, though ScSZ was in the rhombohedral phase before the heat-treatment with NiO.
Titulo: Carbon deposition over Ni-ScSZ anodes subjected to various heat-treatments for internal reforming of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: These results suggested that a strong interaction between NiO and ScSZ was induced by the high-temperature heat-treatment.
Titulo: Carbon deposition over Ni-ScSZ anodes subjected to various heat-treatments for internal reforming of solid oxide fuel cells
Carbon deposition over Ni-ScSZ anodes subjected to various heat-treatments for internal reforming of solid oxide fuel cells
